summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of portion of Morrow's addition lying east of 3rd Ave. N.W. and north of south line of alley in Block 2 at N.E. corner of 3rd Ave. N.W. and W. 85th St., with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-439 and 17-320, respectively.
